entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 14 April 2023
